data.title: Nick Greiner - Better Place lyrics
data.meta_description: Lyrics for Better Place by Nick Greiner. {{lyrics_excerpt}}
data.text:
Imma go and seize the moment

Cause tomorrows never promised if you haven′t noticed

Used to live up in the past I was at my lowest

Point in life I had no goals and I wasn't focused

Now I′m in a better place in my head

I feel the peace of Jesus Christ my daily bread

Is from the maker of this life I'm feeling led

To spread the truth even despite of what they said

Jesus ain't real

That′s a lie from the pit I renounce that

Imma talk bout my King till he comes back

Aint a spirit or a demon getting me off track

If it′s a spirit from below then I'll send it back

Down to the pits of hell where they all belong

And you can do it too just trust In God he′s very strong

He'll take away the pain and all the hurt until it′s gone

The victory was set in stone just think back to the cross

We will fly away like blue jays

We will fly away in due time

But right now we're walking by faith

Pick our cross up every day

We will fly away like blue jays

We will fly away in due time

But right now we′re walking by faith

Pick our cross up every day

A lot of y'all are scared to die

I used to feel the same way until I died with him

Looked my old self in the mirror then I said goodbye

Got baptized in the spirit now he lives within

And thinking back to the past I don't recognize

Myself in the slightest when I delighted in sin, yeah

I did a 180 straight to God

Away from shame away from death he really changed my mind

A new creation in his kingdom now I feel alive

The one sheep that is lost I pray that you find

Your Shepard′s looking for you

Every day and every night he′s really fighting for you

And not a day goes by where he don't think about you

And you can change your life today I know you got it in you

Just love the Lord with all your heart and he will make you anew
